title: Lawmakers Urge Aggressive Action From Regulators on Big Tech
text: Senators at a hearing pushed for assurances that the F.T.C. and Justice Department would provide vigorous oversight of the companies.

title: Facebook outlines rules for content oversight board that can overrule Zuckerberg
text: The social network's "Supreme Court" could be running early next year.

title: Custodians Versus Entrepreneurs: Exxon Mobil Versus Facebook
text: Nobody ever waxed rich owning an electric utility. You wanna own them only when their cash yield is competitive with Treasuries, secure, likely to ratchet up 3% or 4% per annum.

title: Facebook Is Spending Millions to Try to Detect Deepfakes
text: Deepfake videos are rising in popularity, and that could be a huge problem for social media companies and their users.

title: Facebook plans oversight board to assist with privacy, content concerns
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin joins "Closing Bell" to report news from Facebook, which has just outlined a plan to institute a content oversight board to handle inappropriate content, fake news and privacy concerns.

title: Facebook enlists Ray-Ban maker to help develop 'Orion' smart glasses
text: Facebook has partnered with Luxottica to develop augmented-reality Ray-Ban glasses, sources familiar with the matter told CNBC.

title: Facebook will soon announce the first members of its oversight board
text: Facebook will soon name the first members of a new oversight board designed to hold the platform more accountable in its content moderation decisions, the company said Tuesday as it released a charter governing the fledgling institution.

title: Facebook outlines how its oversight board for content decisions will work
text: The social network has finalized some of the details for its content oversight board.

title: Facebook’s new policy Supreme Court could override Zuckerberg
text: A real check to Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s control is finally coming in the form of a 11- to 40-member Oversight Board that will review appeals to its policy decisions like content takedowns and make recommendations for changes. Today Facebook released the charter establishing the theoretically independent Oversight Board, with Zuckerberg explaining that when it […]

title: Facebook details rules for its new 'Supreme Court' that will handle controversial posts
text: Facebook released new governing documents for an independent oversight board that can overturn decisions by the company itself.

title: Facebook to launch 'supreme court' to judge controversial content
text: Facebook has revealed the rules that will govern its "supreme court" - a new 40-person board that will make the final decision on controversial questions about the social network's content.

title: Facebook enlists Ray-Ban maker to help with 'Orion' smart glasses, a project years in the making
text: Facebook has partnered with Luxottica to develop augmented-reality Ray-Ban glasses code-named 'Orion', people familiar with the matter told CNBC.

title: Facebook, police team up to train AI to spot livestreamed shootings
text: Police will be sending in footage of firearms training to help Facebook detect shooting videos.

title: Facebook teams up with police to stop streaming of terror attacks
text: Tech company to equip officers with body cameras to identify terror attacks sooner

title: Facebook Expands Definition of Terrorist Organizations to Limit Extremism
text: The change was one of several Facebook announced ahead of a hearing with federal lawmakers on Wednesday.

title: Facebook to use UK police video to detect live-streamed terror attacks
text: Facebook has teamed up with the Metropolitan Police to prevent live-streaming of terror attacks, six months after the Christchurch mosque gunman streamed his actions using the social network's Live feature.

title: Facebook’s Reputation May Cause Libra to Fail
text: Facebook's reputation -- causing government fear -- is dampening Libra's chance at success. What does this mean for FB stock?

title: Revealed: catastrophic effects of working as a Facebook moderator
text: Exclusive: Job has left some ‘addicted’ to extreme material and pushed others to far right

title: Why Stablecoins Like Facebook's Libra Are Under Scrutiny
text: Stablecoins designed to minimize the volatility experienced by many popular cryptocurrencies may be subject to liquidity risks in times of stress.

title: Facebook defends cryptocurrency plans amid call for Europe-wide ban
text: Facebook has refuted suggestions that its upcoming cryptocurrency could threaten existing monies and banks.
